question: ‘SkillsBuild’ is an online learning platform of which technology company?
explanation:
In November 2019, IBM India launched the SkillsBuild platform, in partnership with Directorate General of Training (DGT), Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship.
Recently, IBM has launched 'SkillsBuild Reignite' programme, to provide free online coursework and mentoring support to job seekers and entrepreneurs. It provides personalized coaching for entrepreneurs to restart their businesses. SkillsBuild is rated as one of the Top 10 online learning platform in the country by National Skills Network.
